#define randint(min, max)   ((random() % ((max)-(min)+1)) + (min))
#define sim_get_metric_from_point(p, m, env)   sim_get_metrics_stats(&const_cast<m3_point &>(p), m,env)
 Returns the metric of the point.
#define sim_get_point_at_iterator(i)   dynamic_cast<m3_point &>(**i)
 Returns the point at the specified iterator.
